description: Try our easy to follow Pork Skewers With Citrus Salt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Orange,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pork Skewers With Citrus Salt Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, rind finely grated (and lemon wedges, to serve)
2 tbs olive oil, for brushing (plus extra to serve)
2 tbs dill, chopped (plus extra sprigs to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 120Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper. In a bowl, combine both rinds, dill, garlic, salt and pepper. Pour evenly onto tray and bake for 1 hour, shaking gently every 15 minutes. Cool, stir in sugar and store in a sealed jar.

Preheat a chargrill over mediumhigh heat. Thread pork strips onto soaked bamboo skewers. Brush with oil. Cook for 5 minutes, turning often, until lightly charred and cooked through. Transfer to a platter, drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with dill and the citrus salt. Serve with lemon wedges and extra salt.
